data.title: Small, nothing luxurious, but great food!
data.text: I've been coming to this place for the past 10 years or so, and their recipes have never changed. From their Chinese food to their pizza, and their fried chicken, I've tried it all, and it's all good and tasty. Just by looking at it from the outside, you wouldn't expect much from this place; don't let that fool you.

data.title: OMG...best pizza/salad/other stuff ever
data.text: If you haven't been here, I don't care where you are in Southern California, this place is worth the drive. Trust me. Try this place for an amazing lunch buffet. They have soooo many choices. Everything is freshly made and delicious. The salad bar is outstanding. Just go. Go right now. You'll see.
